newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sony"s shares fall on profit-taking.
newsitem.headline: Sony"s shares fall on profit-taking.

text.p: Shares in Sony Corp eased on Wednesday morning, as participants continued to take profits in major international blue-chips after a recent buying spree, brokers said.
The share price of the consumer electronics giant fell 120 yen to 8,680 yen at 0047 GMT. Turnover was 556,100 shares.
"Sony is still the core of the market, and its shares will be bought again after a round of profit-taking," said a senior broker at a second-tier Japanese securities house.
